title: Ashley Madison claims new sign-ups, more females despite hack
text: Report on Business The attack Ashley Madison has likely sharply lowered the price Avid Life could muster in any sale of assets, assuming it could find a buyer willing to take on a company facing several multimillion-dollar lawsuits.
